text: The 1985 Vuelta a España was the 40th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Valladolid, with a prologue individual time trial on 23 April, and Stage 9 occurred on 2 May with a stage to Balneario de Panticosa. The race finished in Salamanca on 12 May. ==Prologue== 23 April 1985 — Valladolid to Valladolid, (ITT) {| |Prologue result {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team !
